headline: A $60 billion Visa, Mastercard slump seen as buying opportunity
summary: (Bloomberg) -- A report that large multinational merchants are exploring ways to bypass traditional credit-card fees presents investors with an opportunity to buy shares of Mastercard Inc. and Visa Inc., according to Wall Street analysts.
